actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1503 of title 18, United States Code, relating to protecting officers and jurors from threats or force, to extend protections against threats to jurors after they have been discharged of their duties.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to impose penalties on anyone who threatens a juror or his property on account of the juror's verdict or participation as a juror.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1503 of title 18, United States Code, relating to protecting officers and jurors from threats or force, to extend protections against threats to jurors after they have been discharged of their duties.
